description: When you’re aiming for some high adventure, the REVOLVR™ Pant has everything you need. Lightweight, durable, and providing the breathability of cotton, these easy-care, quick-dry pants are trail-tough or restaurant ready. Durable, anti-abrasion performance and premium (UPF 50+) sun protection make the REVOLVR™ an excellent choice for outdoor fun.
name: Kuhl Revolvr Pants, 32" Inseam - Mens
